descriptions.overview: Bronze wall mirror is accented with exquisite detail enhancing your home with style.
list: Bronze finish wall mirror is accented with exquisite detail that enhances your home with sophistication and style
Composite frame with generous 1.25-in beveled edges adds another decorative dimension
Rectangular design measures 40-in H x 30-in W, perfect for displaying in a master bedroom or near an entryway
53-lb mirror hangs horizontally or vertically, with mounting hardware included
Ideal for complementing warm-toned decor and matching fixtures

reviews.text: This product looks very nice. It is well built. It has four mounting backets because you can hang it two ways 40 H x 30 W or 30 H x 40 W. It is not hard to hang. I hung it over a fireplace by myself on a ladder it was not hard. I measured and got the mounting backets in place. I had the backets that are on the mirror between my index and middle fingers and hung it on the the first attempt. I am 6'3 so that may of helped.
reviews.author: Not a Handyman

reviews.title: "Beautiful Mirror"
reviews.text: Purchased this mirror to go above a large sectional and it looks beautiful with other accents. I was not 100% sure until taking the mirror out of the package in my home but I am very pleased. Even more please to find that Uttermost made the mirror for Allen+Roth. What a deal.
reviews.author: Ohiowright

reviews.title: "Great look!"
reviews.text: Just bought two of these online to hang vertically over the master bedroom double-sided dresser, and they look fabulous! They were VERY reasonably priced, yet have a much pricier look. They are also lighter than many mirrors of similar size, which makes me more confident that they'll stay put (what with California earthquakes and all)! While I didn't do the hanging myself (I'm no good at the measuring part!), my dad and nephew had no problems at all. I would most definitely say that I am a happy customer!
reviews.author: passionate4DIY

reviews.title: "LOVE LOVE LOVE"
reviews.text: Great purchase and so different from other mirrors I have seen out there. It has a metal look but it is actually wood. Looks really nice with my bedroom furniture. Hanging it is a little tricky, you just need someone who is handy to do it. Thanks Jay !!
reviews.author: Loretta

reviews.title: "Beautiful mirror - just what I was looking for!"
reviews.text: I ordered this mirror on line for in-store pick up. When I arrived at the store it was ready and there were absolutely no problems. It is a beautiful addition to our newly remodeled bathroom.
reviews.author: fanofthebraves

reviews.text: We LOVE the look of this vanity mirror in our guest bathroom as it blends well with our Palm Tree and Island theme guest bedroom/bath.
reviews.author: TBella

reviews.title: "Beautiful"
reviews.text: This mirror is beautiful and looks fantastic in our bathroom we just remodeled. Easy to hang since it has hardware for either direction you want it hung.Two thumbs up!
reviews.author: Kelly

reviews.title: "Sometimes you pick right ...."
reviews.text: I bought two of these for our Master Bathroom following the installation of some new granite countertops and sinks. They replaced the big 1990's single mirror and the multiple hanging options made it an ease. Their lightweight meant that drywall screws were fine and both were in place in no time. Wife was happy. I'm happy.
reviews.author: AbeFroman

reviews.title: "Beautiful and a good deal"
reviews.text: I used this mirror in a main bath I remodeled.  It blends well with the oil rubbed bronze antique look faucets I used.  It is very easy to hang and the hanger are unique in that you can make leveling adjustments if you happen to hang it off just a little.  Really a great idea....  It looks much more expensivce than the $99 I paid for it.
reviews.author: ktim

reviews.title: "Great looking mirror."
reviews.text: These mirrors look great in my new home and fit the decor as we went with bronze fixtures in lighting and faucets. The quality is very good, but, they are heavy and will require two people to install them. We looked at other mirrors made by other companies but they felt like cheap plastic.
reviews.author: John R.

reviews.title: "Love This Mirror"
reviews.text: I purchased this mirror to hang in my living room on a large wall where it looks fantastic. This mirror looks way more expensive than the price I paid. This was a great purchase.
reviews.author: SBGG

reviews.title: "nice mirror"
reviews.text: I had my contractor install this, but he had no issues and it looks great in my new bathroom. built well, nice design.
reviews.author: hdwillie

reviews.title: "Beautiful mirror"
reviews.text: I love this mirror!!  Very well made and looks quite expensive.  Excellent value
reviews.author: Roxannh78

reviews.title: "PRETTY"
reviews.text: I WAS SPEECH LESS WHEN I SEEN MY MIRROR. I HUNG IT OVER MY BATHROOM VANITY. IT LOOKS SO AWESOME. I WALK PAST AND STARE EVEN IF I'M NOT USING THE FACILITIES. SO UNIQUE, JUST LOVE IT!!
reviews.author: CM2013

reviews.title: "Beautiful accent piece"
reviews.text: Well designed mirror. Can be hung either way. Bold but beauitful. We wanted to freshen up our half bath so changed out the mirror, light and fixtures. Went with oil rubbed bronze fixtures that look great with this mirror. Very happy with this purchase.
reviews.author: Latonarl

reviews.title: "Very Rich"
reviews.text: I used two of these mirrors in updating a 20 year old bathroom. They look great, and really enhanced the beauty of the finished bathroom. The price is very reasonable, and I am very pleased with the outcome.
reviews.author: Molly

reviews.title: "Excellent quality, great value"
reviews.text: I am having my bathroom completely remodeled. I have purchased all my supplies--fixtures, tile, trim, paint, lights, mirrors, paint--the whole nine yards. Lowe's has been absolutely wonderful along the journey. Just fabulous. The service and staff far outshine Lowe's main competitor!
reviews.author: Ruthie

reviews.title: "Beautiful Mirror"
reviews.text: This is possibly the most beautiful piece of furniture I own. It has an "other world" look and feel to it. A nice piece that fits into virtually any decor.
reviews.author: GoodWill

reviews.title: "High quality look at a reasonable price"
reviews.text: The finish is a beautiful patina with a hint of verdigris. I love the bullet detail! This is a heavy mirror.
reviews.author: Prattdesignco

reviews.title: "Beautiful"
reviews.text: Heavy-- need big nails or anchors. Very beautiful.
reviews.author: Marie

reviews.title: "Beautiful Mirror"
reviews.text: Love love love this mirror it's everything I was looking for. It looks amazing with my rustic vanity.
reviews.author: Zana

reviews.title: "Excellent industrial looking mirror"
reviews.text: Beautiful accent to a modern looking bathroom
reviews.author: Mar

reviews.title: "Very nice!"
reviews.text: Workers great with the Allen Roth Vanity
reviews.author: Matthew

reviews.text: This mirror is actually a little darker than it appeared on-line, but it is just as beautiful. I purchased this mirror to replace the bulky mirror that has been on my dresser for 37 years. I wanted "cleaner" lines. We took the time to locate the studs as well as measuring the distance between the brackets for hanging and a level to make sure the brackets were level and it went up beautifully. My purchase exceeded my expectations and I' loving it.
reviews.author: Pleased

reviews.title: "Bronze Wall Mirror"
reviews.text: Product wrapped well. No dents, scratches. Color consistent on whole frame. Frame sturdy. Comes with hangers already on back to hang horizontally or vertically. Wife very happy with it.
reviews.author: horseman

reviews.title: "Love this mirror"
reviews.text: This mirror is everything I had hoped for. It is beautiful and very well made. It is rather heavy but comes with a very sturdy mounting system which allows for some adjustment after the mounts are on the wall. It can be hung either vertically or horizontilally which makes it more versitile than some. We placed it in our entryway and it really makes a statement the moment you enter the house. Love it!
reviews.author: Jill

reviews.title: "Great look"
reviews.text: will builttakes a little time to hang it level because they do not recommend to use wire
reviews.author: rick

reviews.title: "Awesome wooden mirrors!"
reviews.text: I bought two for a bathroom remodel. We had a wall of mirror with hollywood lights surrounding it( so 1970's) and wanted a more classy updated bathrrom. The mirrors are beautiful-so heavy and expensive looking!We put delta 4 lights over each one and the look is fantastic!Our modern updated bathroom, 12 x 16 ,now has a morrocan look, and we love it!
reviews.author: Labag

reviews.title: "Worth the price."
reviews.text: Very classy, with "heft" We hung it in our bathroom & with the Italian tile. It is beautiful. It can be used with any period.
reviews.author: Scrappy

reviews.title: "LOVE IT"
reviews.text: We put this mirror in a bathroom in our current home, and love it so much we ordered 3 more for our newly purchased home.
reviews.author: lilred6266

reviews.title: "Beautiful Mirror"
reviews.text: Love love love this mirror it's everything I was looking for. It looks amazing with my rustic vanity.
reviews.author: Zana

reviews.title: "Excellent industrial looking mirror"
reviews.text: Beautiful accent to a modern looking bathroom

reviews.text: We have three of these in our bathrooms.  Very pleased.

reviews.text: Nice heavy mirror...looks fantastic in our entryway.

answers.author: mudhook
answers.text: No it does not. I just bought one and weighed mine at home. My scale shows just under 27lbs. That said, I still plan to use a hanger system that will accommodate 50lbs.

answers.author: King
answers.text: Yes, it is very heavy. Very sturdy

answers.author: ProductExpert
answers.text: You are correct. The weight of this product is 60 pounds.

answers.author: J
answers.text: I am searching as we speak for the larger one. My employer saw the larger one in Lowe's, now I cannot locate one anywhere. So, yes, I believe it does come in larger. :)

answers.author: CommunityAnswer
answers.text: No, this product does not come in other sizes.

questions.question: "Can this be hung in a bathroom?"
questions.author: Anonymous

answers.author: Auty
answers.text: I hung mine in my bathroom & it looks great!

answers.author: allen + roth Team
answers.text: Yes, you can hang this item in the bathroom.

questions.question: "Does this mirror come in a smaller size?"
questions.author: Anonymous

answers.author: CommunityAnswer
answers.text: No, it doesn't come in smaller size.

questions.question: "Can this mirror be placed in a bathroom"
questions.author: MSN

answers.author: CommunityAnswer
answers.text: This mirror can be placed in the bathroom.

questions.question: "How do you install the included hardware"
questions.author: Carol

answers.author: Barry
answers.text: Two nails, provided, are inserted through both holes which angles them at a 45•. The lower hanging portion hooks into the loops that are screwed into the mirror. With that said, I don't trust the set up given the weight. If the nails happen to hit studs I would consider using the rigs, but I am still concerned that the moving portion of the bracket provides possible compromise. I'll be using dry wall anchors, rated at or above 50lbs.

questions.question: "What is the mirror size without the frame?"
questions.author: Anonymous

answers.author: Bone
answers.text: I'm not exactly sure on mirror size as we purchased it for my son's house. Frame is about 2.5-3 inches wide....so subtract -6 inches from stated size.

answers.author: CommunityAnswer
answers.text: The instructions come with it, but it takes a few screws to hang this.

questions.question: "Does this mirror come in a smaller size?"
questions.author: Anonymous

answers.author: Auty
answers.text: This was the only size I saw available.

questions.question: "suggestion for a light to hang over mirror"
questions.author: Anonymous

answers.author: CM2013
answers.text: I CHOSE TO HANG A SMALLER LIGHT ABOVE MY MIRROR. A LIGHT FIXTURE THAT FIT EVENLY WITH THE MIRROR WAS TOO OVERWHELMING, ALSO THOUGHT IT TOOK AWAY FROM THE BEAUTY OF THE MIRROR.
